detail_desc: Short top in seersucker made from a cotton blend with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, a square neckline at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Short puff sleeves, and narrow elastication at the top of the back, shoulders and around the sleeves.
Coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck that has elasticated gathers at the front and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a bow at the front, a grosgrain trim around the top and an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a carabiner hook and keyring. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather details. Padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a contrasting colour grosgrain loop at the back. Reflective details. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Low neckline at the back with a grosgrain ribbon.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Plastic hair claws. Height 2.5 cm, width 35 cm.
Sleeveless top in a silk crêpe weave in a wide, gently flared style with a rounded hem.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and tapered legs with sides stripes.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with lace details. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft satin with lace details. Top with a V-neck and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with two bodysuits, two pairs of leggings, a romper suit and a scarf in soft cotton jersey. Bodysuits with short sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Romper suit with long sleeves, front pockets and press-studs down the front and along one leg. Scarf with press-studs at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in pleated jersey with a unique nursing feature. Opening at the back held together with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back and metal fastener at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Bikini top with a lined, shaped front, wide shoulder straps and wide elastication at the hem. Wide metal fastening at the back.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a gathered seam and detachable, satin tie belt at the waist. Zip at the back and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Short dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool and glittery threads.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied with a fabric storage pouch.

Short off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a sheen with side support in the bodice, a silicone trim at the top and dropped shoulder straps with a knot. Concealed zip with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back and a seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Solid colour ties in a grosgrain weave. Width 6.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 2-3Y) and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Sun hat in a soft weave lined in a cotton weave. Ties under the chin (not in size 0-4M).
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and a seam below the knee with flared legs.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Slides with open toes, pile crossover straps at the top, imitation suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Short, sleeveless top in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the front, smocking at the back and a scalloped hem.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in soft viscose jersey.
Elastic bracelets with beads made from semi-precious stones, metal, glass and wood.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a pleated weave with narrow shoulder straps and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Set with a narrow Alice band and an elasticated imitation leather scrunchie.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Tunic in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey.
Jumper in a soft fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a slight sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a wrapover front with soft draping at the top. Seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets, and wide, 3/4-length legs.
Cardigan in a soft, marled knit with frayed, raw edges, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in a textured cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Relaxed-fit shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short, wide legs.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders and long dolman sleeves.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide-fitting dress in a patterned viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and a seam at the back with buttons at the top. Unlined.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in a patterned organic cotton weave with a small flounce around the neckline, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.

Soft nursing bras in lace and microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Joggers in washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and tapered legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and short legs.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey with wide, elasticated smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit. Side pockets, a low crotch and wide, tapered legs.
Lightweight nylon coat with a filling of 70% recycled down and 30% recycled feathers. Front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves laced together with satin ribbon and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed slightly stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.5 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 3.5 cm.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
